availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Casey County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Malinda Russell Lamme in Lincoln County on October 29, 1856. Farmer in Casey County in 1860. Private and second lieutenant in the 1st Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) from September 8, 1861, to December 31, 1864.

ab.bibl:
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 14-15.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Casey County, Rolling Fork Precinct, p. 49.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Lincoln County Marriages, Film #001904136, p. 26.
